track.name: Perpetual Blues Machine
comments: First time listening to Keb Mo. I would like to listen to more of his music, he sounds very talented with good lyrics and a good voice.
I love Keb Mo some mo
Accusedcat, Not only that, his dogs and cats wear 'em too! He's of the opinion that a hat enhances the appearance of ANY mammal, two-legged or four! Aside from that, I really love this song!
another one bit cha, huh Keb? yep- perpetual blues machine....
I think Keb' Mo' was born wearing a hat.

... you had me hangin' on your arm...

brilliant. Love me my Keb' Mo'
This man is the coolest blues dude around. He takes a song and turns it into his, he makes you listen to every word. The man is brilliant.
